name: Amy Johnson's Letters - Hull Museums Project
name_original: Amy Johnson's Letters - Hull Museums Project
description:
A game about the life of Amy Johnson, a pilot from Kingston upon Hull who had broken aviation records and served the RAF.

Game Art - Nina Batraniec (available on ArtStation)
Game Design / Code - Kuba Krysztofiak 
Music and Sounds - Minnie McIntyre-Bhatty
